resources.string: Do you have an existing restaurant list (like notes app or spreadsheet) that you want to import?
We\'ll send you an email with instructions on how to finish the import process from your computer. (It\'s super easy.)
Coolio. Please confirm your email address

string-array.name: lets_started_options
string-array.item: Yes! Yes! A million times yes!

resources.string: You have no spots yet!\n\nAdd places you want to try or have been to with the + below, or import an existing list from the sidebar

You haven't made any lists yet!

 Create your own lists, like "Best Hipster-Watching Bars", from your place in My Spots.

Start with the + below.

You aren't following any friends' lists yet!

 When a friend sends you a list, you can access it here and see any future changes to it.

 If you have friends using Nomwell, go ask them to share a lists!

You haven\'t received any spot recommendations yet!\n\n Friends can send you individual spot recs using the Share feature in My Spots, without creating a list. Received recommendations will show up here.
Spots near you would normally be shown here, but GPS in Nomwell is currently disable.\n\n To see nearby spots, enable GPS in Settings -> Location.
You must add places to My Spots before using this feature!
You must have lists before using this feature!
Allow \"Nomwell\" to access your location while you use the app?
You\'ll then be able to see what spots are nearby
To quickly add spots to your list
